ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field
IDS: ntms
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 2
PARENT_CONTAINER: ntms
FIELD_NAME: vacuum_toroidal_field
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ntms -> vacuum_toroidal_field

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ntms]: Description of neoclassical tearing modes

ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/r0.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/r0
IDS: ntms
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field
FIELD_NAME: r0
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ntms -> vacuum_toroidal_field -> r0

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ntms]: Description of neoclassical tearing modes
CONTAINER[ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field]: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition)

ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0.documentation:
=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field/b0
IDS: ntms
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 2
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 3
PARENT_CONTAINER: ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field
FIELD_NAME: b0
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: ntms -> vacuum_toroidal_field -> b0

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS.

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[ntms]: Description of neoclassical tearing modes
CONTAINER[ntms/vacuum_toroidal_field]: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition)

IDS: ntms

FIELD_NAME: mode

CONTAINER[ntms/time_slice]: Description of neoclassical tearing modes for various time slices
